member.name: M:IceGrid.AdminOperations_.syncApplicationWithoutRestart(IceGrid.ApplicationDescriptor,Ice.Current)
member.summary: Synchronize a deployed application with the given application descriptor. This operation will replace the current descriptor with this new descriptor only if no server restarts are necessary for the update of the application. If some servers need to be restarted, the synchronization is rejected with a DeploymentException.
member.param: The application descriptor.
member.exception: Raised if the session doesn't hold the exclusive lock or if another session is holding the lock.
Raised if application deployment failed.
Raised if the application doesn't exist.

member.name: T:IceGrid.FileIteratorOperations_

member.name: M:IceGrid.FileIteratorOperations_.read(System.Int32,System.String[]@,Ice.Current)
member.summary: Read lines from the log file.
member.param: Specifies the maximum number of bytes to be received. The server will ensure that the returned message doesn't exceed the given size.

The lines read from the file. If there was nothing to read from the file since the last call to read, an empty sequence is returned. The last line of the sequence is always incomplete (and therefore no '\n' should be added when writing the last line to the to the output device).
member.returns: True if EOF is encountered.
member.exception: Raised if there was a problem to read lines from the file.
member.param: The Current object for the invocation.

member.summary: Destroy the iterator.

member.name: M:IceGrid.FileIteratorPrxHelper.read(System.Int32,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Read lines from the log file.
member.param: Specifies the maximum number of bytes to be received. The server will ensure that the returned message doesn't exceed the given size.

The lines read from the file. If there was nothing to read from the file since the last call to read, an empty sequence is returned. The last line of the sequence is always incomplete (and therefore no '\n' should be added when writing the last line to the to the output device).
member.returns: True if EOF is encountered.
member.exception: Raised if there was a problem to read lines from the file.

member.name: T:IceGrid.AMI_Admin_syncApplicationWithoutRestart
member.summary: Synchronize a deployed application with the given application descriptor. This operation will replace the current descriptor with this new descriptor only if no server restarts are necessary for the update of the application. If some servers need to be restarted, the synchronization is rejected with a DeploymentException.

member.name: M:IceGrid.AMI_Admin_syncApplicationWithoutRestart.ice_response
member.summary: ice_response indicates that the operation completed successfully.

member.name: T:IceGrid.AMI_Admin_updateApplicationWithoutRestart
member.summary: Update a deployed application with the given update application descriptor only if no server restarts are necessary for the update of the application. If some servers need to be restarted, the synchronization is rejected with a DeploymentException.

member.name: M:IceGrid.AMI_Admin_updateApplicationWithoutRestart.ice_response
member.summary: ice_response indicates that the operation completed successfully.

member.name: T:IceGrid.QueryOperations_

member.summary: Find a well-known object by identity.
member.param: The identity.
member.returns: The proxy or null if no such object has been found.
member.param: The Current object for the invocation.

member.name: M:IceGrid.QueryOperations_.findObjectByType(System.String,Ice.Current)
member.summary: Find a well-known object by type. If there are several objects registered for the given type, the object is randomly selected.
member.param: The object type.
member.returns: The proxy or null, if no such object has been found.
member.param: The Current object for the invocation.

member.name: M:IceGrid.QueryOperations_.findObjectByTypeOnLeastLoadedNode(System.String,IceGrid.LoadSample,Ice.Current)
member.summary: Find a well-known object by type on the least-loaded node. If the registry does not know which node hosts the object (for example, because the object was registered with a direct proxy), the registry assumes the object is hosted on a node that has a load average of 1.0.
member.param: The object type.
The sampling interval.
member.returns: The proxy or null, if no such object has been found.
member.param: The Current object for the invocation.

member.name: M:IceGrid.QueryOperations_.findAllObjectsByType(System.String,Ice.Current)
member.summary: Find all the well-known objects with the given type.
member.param: The object type.
member.returns: The proxies or an empty sequence, if no such objects have been found.
member.param: The Current object for the invocation.

member.name: M:IceGrid.QueryOperations_.findAllReplicas(Ice.ObjectPrx,Ice.Current)
member.summary: Find all the object replicas associated with the given proxy. If the given proxy is not an indirect proxy from a replica group, an empty sequence is returned.
member.param: The object proxy.
member.returns: The proxies of each object replica or an empty sequence, if the given proxy is not from a replica group.
member.param: The Current object for the invocation.
